name: tm95
effect: Teaches snarl to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Snarl to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user yells as if it is ranting about
something, making the target’s Sp. Atk
stat decrease.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user yells as if it is ranting about
something, making the target’s Sp. Atk
stat decrease.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user yells as if it’s ranting about
something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stat
of opposing Pokémon.

The user yells as if it’s ranting about something,

flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even
the sky. This may also make the target flinch.
